content: What is your current focus this week?

This week, my focus is on preparing for the upcoming board meeting on November 12 by ensuring all operational plans are in place and execution is coordinated across functions (tech, finance, marketing, legal). I'm also working on identifying and clearing blockers to execution, adjusting plans based on capacity constraints, and tracking progress against commitments and deadlines. Additionally, I am optimizing processes, standardizing repeatable tasks to reduce variability, and implementing process improvements that increase quality or speed.
